pli-tv-bi-vb-pj6:1.9: “Confront” renders _paṭicodesi_. For a discussion of the closely related term _codeti_, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj6:2.1.6: “She has told her” presumably means that the nun who has committed the offense has spoken about it.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj6:2.1.14: Vin-vn-ṭ 1989: _Saliṅge tu ṭhitāyāti pabbajjāliṅgeyeva ṭhitāya_, “For one remaining in the characteristic means: for one remaining in the characteristic of being gone forth.”
